text: Carlo Moscatiello (1650–1739) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period, active near his natal city of Naples. He was active in quadratura. ==References== * Category:1650 births Category:1739 deaths Category:17th- century Neapolitan people Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:18th-century Italian painters Category:Neapolitan painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Quadratura painters Category:18th-century Neapolitan people
title: Carlo Moscatiello
